title: New Fairfield superintendent to present budget
title_page: New Fairfield superintendent to present budget
maintext:
NEW FAIRFIELD — Superintendent Alicia Roy will present her 2018-19 proposed budget on Thursday.
The presentation will be held at 6:30 p.m. before the board’s regular meeting at 7:30 p.m., where members will discuss the proposal.
The school board will then hold a budget workshop at 7 p.m. on Jan. 8. All meetings will take place in the town’s community room.
aquinn@newstimes.com
